articles.title: Olivia Rodrigo drops her brand-new Grammy trophy and it breaks into half - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The singer was holding her three trophies and posing for pictures when she dropped one of them.
articles.content:
The incident is reminiscent of the time another famous singer-songwriter, Taylor Swift, dropped and broke one of her trophies at the 2010 Grammys. 
The 19-year-old Rodrigo was one of the big winners… [+337 chars]

articles.title: South Korean actress Gong Hyo-jin and singer Kevin Oh confirm relationship - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The pair was spotted together at the wedding of fellow celebrities, Son Ye-jin and Hyun Bin, where Gong was said to have caught the bridal bouquet.
articles.content:
Singer Oh, who is 31, also confirmed the news through a letter on his official fan forum.
